mathiwaranayen pasuwa aanduwe ka්riya piliwelin pennum karanne ee aya rajya palanayata hakiyawak nathi aya pamanak nowa samanya minis buddhiyen me karanaya therum gannatath hakiyawak nathi kandayamak bawa misa wena deyak nowana bawa mage hagimaya. 1993 me aakaraye dakunu palath sabha parajaye sita gamanak aarambha karana wita apita iwen wage penune parajaya wetha wegayen adi yana parana ejapaye katha sappu tikaya.
